title: Easiest Keto Meatza You’ll Ever Make!
directions: Dump that chicken into a bowl and mash it up. I mean really mash it.
Add the egg in with the chicken, along with all the spices and parmesan cheese.
Mix it up well until there’s no more streaks of eggs showing. All the spices are to taste, so if you need a stronger flavor, then add more.
Throw it into a pizza pan and crush that sucker down with your fork, this is how it’ll look:
Put it in the oven for 15, until you see that it’s set on the top. It will have a little bit of browning around the edges – that’s when you know.
